Articles.Content: Greetings! I'm not really new, I just never really joined the forums. I've got like ~170 hours in, so I'm definitely no Scott Manley, but I've landed on the Mun a time or two and fiddled with some mods/addons. Anyway, just thought I'd make an appearance. Hope you're all flying safe. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Oh, and don't get too close to Jool, no matter how tempting the green might be.

Hello jondugger123, and welcome to the forums!

Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
Welcome to the forums! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Hope you enjoy your stay!

Welcome!

But you know, green means "Go", it means "Good", it's the universal standard for "This is healthy for you". So go on - kiss Jool. You know you want to. It will welcome you with open arms and give you a big metaphorical hug.

> 
> don't get too close to Jool, no matter how tempting the green light might be.

Sorry, this just reminded me of English class last year: The Great Gatsby, and all of that. Good advice.

Welcome aboard the American dream!

That was beautiful, Deddly. I think you made Jeb tear up a little bit.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-11T23:23:25Z" title="08/11/2015 11:23  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 11, 2015</time> by jondugger123**
